P

PIXEL_DP_RATIO - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.util.DisplayUtil
The ratio between pixel and dp measurement.
PREFERENCE_HEADERS_EXTRA - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
The name of the extra, which is used to saved the preference headers within a bundle.
PreferenceActivity - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity
An activity, which provides a navigation for multiple groups of preferences, in which each group is represented by an instance of the class PreferenceHeader.
PreferenceDecorator - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.decorator
A decorator, which allows to apply Material style on specific preferences.
PreferenceDecorator(Context) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.decorator.PreferenceDecorator
Creates a new decorator, which allows to apply Material style on specific preferences.
PreferenceFragment - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity
A fragment, which allows to show multiple preferences.
PreferenceFragment() - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceFragment
 
PreferenceFragmentListener - Interface in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity
Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified when the currently shown preference fragment of a PreferenceActivity has been changed, must implement.
PreferenceHeader - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity
A navigation item, which categorizes multiple preferences.
PreferenceHeader(Context, int) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceHeader
Creates a new navigation item, which categorizes multiple preferences.
PreferenceHeaderAdapter - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter
An adapter, which provides instances of the class PreferenceHeader for visualization using a list view.
PreferenceHeaderAdapter(Context) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.PreferenceHeaderAdapter
Creates a new adapter, which provides instances of the class PreferenceHeader to be used for visualization via a list view.
PreferenceHeaderAdapter.ViewHolder - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter
The view holder, which is used by the adapter.
PreferenceHeaderDecorator - Interface in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity
Defines the interface, a class, which should be able to modify the visualization of preference headers, must implement.
PreferenceHeaderFragment - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.fragment
A fragment, which shows multiple preference headers and provides navigation to each header's fragment.
PreferenceHeaderFragment() - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.fragment.PreferenceHeaderFragment
 
PreferenceHeaderParser - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.parser
An utility class, which allows to parse instances of the class PreferenceHeader from XML files.
